name: Club Rewind
description:
Welcome to Club Rewind,  where time is rewound magically after every song and the style of music changes to reflect the new time period. The game features two original tracks and a surprise at the end.

NOTE: If your keyboard doesn't support three or four arrow key inputs, try hitting part of the notes with the WASD keys

Created by Jeff and Joy

Jeff - Programming and Music

Joy - Art
